meanings.sent1: The decision to jump off the bridge without a parachute was reasonless.
meanings.sent2: Her reasonless fear of butterflies made her avoid the garden.
meanings.sent3: It was reasonless to bring an umbrella to the desert.
meanings.sent4: His reasonless anger towards the harmless cat puzzled everyone.
meanings.sent5: The reasonless act of painting the grass blue confused the neighbors.

meanings.definition: Not based on or guided by reason.
meanings.sent1: The magician's reasonless tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: Ignoring the warning signs was a reasonless choice.
meanings.sent3: It seemed reasonless to wear a winter coat in the summer heat.
meanings.sent4: Her reasonless belief in ghosts led her to fear every creak in the house.
meanings.sent5: The reasonless decision to drive blindfolded ended in disaster.

meanings.sent1: His reasonless demand for a million dollars was quickly dismissed.
meanings.sent2: It was reasonless to expect a cat to bark like a dog.
meanings.sent3: The reasonless idea of flying to the moon on a paper airplane made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her reasonless fear of the harmless spider caused her to scream.
meanings.sent5: The reasonless plan to build a house of cards in a windstorm failed miserably.
